name: The Bonds We Lost
description:
As one of the soldiers taking part in the Battle of Borodino. Your regiment escorting a convoy of artillery was ambushed by the army of Napoleon and now you have to regain your bearings and find the rest of your unit. 

Note: This is a prototype concept that involves the Napoleonic Era and the project itself. 

Controls-

WASD to move.

Space to jump.

Click and drag the screen to look around.
